articles.content:
Brett Scott taught Michael Walker how to ride in New Zealand many moons ago and on Saturday the gun jockey repaid his former mentor with victory on Irish Flame in the Listed Ballarat Cup.

articles.title: ‘It’s nice to know you’re wanted’: Josh Dunkley opens up after failed trade to Essendon - Fox Sports
articles.description: Gun midfielder Josh Dunkley says it’s pleasing to “know that you are wanted” by the Bulldogs, vowing to win back any respect lost from teammates after a chaotic trade period.
articles.content: Dunkley will officially return to Western Bulldogs pre-season training in January after his club couldnt strike a deal with Essendon during the recent AFL exchange period, despite his trade request a… [+2450 chars]

articles.title: Stoinis says shortened tour won't increase Kohli threat - cricket.com.au
articles.description: Marcus Stoinis expects to see the best of Virat Kohli during the India captain's shortened tour of Australia, which starts on Friday
articles.content:
Marcus Stoinis hopes less will not mean more for Virat Kohli when the India captain's Australian summer cameo begins at the SCG on Friday.
